Download Extension

1. Click on the download link below to download the extension for your browser:

  • Chrome: Download for Chrome

2. Use the Extension

  1. Once installed, open your Linked In profile page
  2. Click the extension icon from your browser's toolbar to open it.
  3. Follow any on-screen instructions to set up and start using the extension.

You can copy and paste the text from your existing resume... we'll take care the rest!

How it works

Frequently Asked Questions

What is AICVPro?

AICVPro is a platform that provides services help you build your CV with the help of AI. You can upload your CV and we will generate a new CV for you based on the information you provide. You can also choose from a variety of templates and customize your CV to your liking. You can also customuze your CV with job descriptions and we will generate a CV for you based on the job description you provide.

Is AICVPro free to use?

Yes, AICVPro is free to use. You can upload your CV and generate a new CV for free. You can also choose from a variety of templates and customize your CV to your liking for free. You can also customize your CV with job descriptions and we will generate a CV for you based on the job description you provide for free.

What makes AICVPro different from other CV building platforms?

AICVPro is different from other CV building platforms because we use AI to generate a new CV for you based on the information you provide. You can also choose from a variety of templates and customize your CV to your liking. You can also customize your CV with job descriptions and we will generate a CV for you based on the job description you provide. AICVPro is also free to use.

Can I save my CV on AICVPro?

Yes, you can save your CV on AICVPro. You can also download your CV as a PDF file and share it with potential employers. You can also edit your CV and generate a new CV based on the information you provide.
